name: Colliders and the temple of the Gaints
name_original: Colliders and the temple of the Gaints
description:
A third person shooter where u must eliminate all enemies to stay alive  

Created by: 

!skuxx#5367

Fiddyowns#2031

Simao#0666

Zearry#2162

Controls

Q and E to switch weapons

W, A, S, D to move

R to reload

Space to Jump 

Left click to shoot, Right click to aim in 

Shift to Run

F to Pick up any item 

Med kits will be applied automatically.

Up and down look movements are inverted
